alert.note: Alert for Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:44PM CDT until July 14 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OGLE COUNTY... At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stillman Valley, or near Byron, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Byron, Davis Junction, Stillman Valley, Lindenwood, Monroe Center, Kings and Chana. Including the following interstate... I-39 between mile markers 109 and 114. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
